title: Fresh Consulting WCAG 2.0 Linter
creator: Fresh Consulting
description: The Fresh Consulting WCAG 2.0 Linter is a set of rules (or sniffs) for PHP Code Sniffer (PHPCS) which can automatically detect and alert when certain WCAG 2.0 violations are detected in code.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
